title: Syntrichia
text:
Syntrichia is a large, cosmopolitan genus of <a href="moss">moss</a>es in the family <a href="Pottiaceae">Pottiaceae</a>. The genus name is of Greek origin for "plus" and "hair", referring to the "twisted <a href="peristome">peristome</a> united by a basal membrane".
, the <a href="World%20Flora%20Online">World Flora Online</a> accepts 114 species in the genus "Syntrichia":
